speaker: Customer
text: You have reached the voicemail of John Smith. Please leave a message after the beep.

speaker: Agent
text: Hello John, this is Sarah calling from XYZ Collections regarding your outstanding balance.

speaker: Customer
text: To ensure a prompt response, please leave your name and number.

speaker: Agent
text: You can reach me directly at 1-800-555-0199. We can help you discuss your payment options.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you for calling, I will return your call as soon as possible.
